query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Beat It', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and popular culture?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal prowess and her iconic hits, like 'I Will Always Love You', impact the landscape of pop and R&B music during her career?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's chameleonic approach to music and fashion influence the glam rock movement and inspire future generations of artists?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's songwriting and the theatricality of Queen's performances redefine the boundaries of rock music and live concerts?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's ability to blend pop and R&B styles, along with her vocal range, reshaped contemporary music since her debut?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's message of peace and social justice in his music contribute to the global popularity of reggae and the promotion of a cultural movement?
